Package metro.WindowControls

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ControlElement
    The interface with all the important methods every control element should have.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionObservable
    Every window control (or other classes) should inherit this class to be able to send information about state changes, button clicks, etc. to other classes in a clean and simple way.
    ActionObserver
    Who ever wants to be able to get information about state changed, button clicks, etc. of window controls, should implement this interface.
    Button
    A button with text ot an image attached to a window.
    Checkbox  
    ColorBar
    A color bar is a stripe of all RGB colors.
    ControlActionManager
    The ControlActionManager knows every ControlElement and handles the user input events.
    Input  
    InputField  
    Label
    Create a label to hold text with optional automatic line breaks.
    List
    Creates a list control element that can have some entries in it.
    Window
    Creates a simple but fancy window with some extra functions like Control-management (managing buttons, labels, etc.).
